changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on Factor Form/OTP (One-Time Purchase) functionality improvements, subscription management features, and UI enhancements. Multiple teams worked on payment handling, voucher systems, checkout pricing, and test adjustments. Several bug fixes and cleanup tasks were completed alongside new feature additions for e-commerce and subscription platforms.

features.name: Config Middlewares
features.description: Added configuration middleware functionality to the system

features.name: Surcharge Price Display
features.description: Adds surcharge price to show total without conditions in pricing display

features.name: Shopify Redirects Simplification
features.description: Removed requirement of local storage override for Shopify redirects in staging

features.name: Expired Payment Handling
features.description: Handle users with expired payment in GD (likely GetDirect) system

features.name: VMSU Family Normalized SKU
features.description: Added normalized SKU for VMSU family in Factor Form with feature gate control

features.name: Voucher Entry Point Reactivation
features.description: Added voucher functionality to Entry Point Reactivation flow

features.name: OTP Address Persistence
features.description: Support PUT method for OTP address persistence

features.name: OTP Checkout Pricing
features.description: Implemented checkout pricing functionality for Factor Form OTP

features.name: llms.txt Implementation
features.description: Implemented llms.txt file for AI/LLM crawlers

features.name: Structured Markup Data
features.description: Implemented structured markup data for our-products page for SEO

features.name: Plan Card Image Contentful Keys
features.description: Added Contentful keys for plan card images

decisions.rationale: Ensuring PetInfoHeader component mounts only on client-side to prevent SSR issues

decisions.what: Feature gate for VMSU family usage
decisions.rationale: Controlled rollout of VMSU family normalized SKU functionality
Simplify Shopify redirect logic in staging environment

decisions.what: Support PUT method for OTP address
decisions.rationale: Enable address updates via PUT requests for better RESTful API design

refactors.reason: Code cleanup for Factor Form endless pause functionality
Removes entry point for new dashboard merge request
Restore cuts in subscription loading page

fixes.issue: OTP Order Summary not updating correctly

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Multiple updates including OTP checkout pricing, VMSU family SKU, endless pause cleanup, and order summary fixes

entities.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase)
entities.context: Address persistence, checkout pricing, and order summary functionality added/fixed

entities.name: Shopify
entities.context: Redirect logic simplified by removing local storage override requirement

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: Keys added for plan card images

entities.name: GD (GetDirect)
entities.context: Enhanced to handle users with expired payments

entities.name: VMSU Family
entities.context: Normalized SKU implementation with feature gate control

entities.name: Reactivation Flow
entities.context: Voucher functionality added to entry point, tests adjusted

key_patterns: Feature gate pattern used for controlled rollout of new functionality (VMSU family)
Client-side only rendering pattern for components with SSR issues
RESTful API improvements with proper HTTP method support (PUT for address updates)
Test-driven development with dedicated test commits for new features
SEO optimization through structured markup data and llms.txt implementation
Modular feature development with multiple PRs for related Factor Form/OTP functionality
Cleanup and technical debt reduction alongside feature development
Ticket-driven development with clear Jira references (TPT, GOC, RTEVMS, MIO prefixes)
